respStmt.resp: TEI-compatible XML markup by Tyana Craig with corrections by Name, Name, and Name.
respStmt.name: Name

publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 05/25/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: took a receipt with twenty more
To cash in full for work to Oct. 31st
By cash for house rent to Oct. 31st
By order upon W. H. Wrigley
To hog wt. 320 lbs 6 ½ pr. lbs.
To paying your order to H. Johnson
To cash for work to Dec 1st 20 ¼ dys
The use of Man x Catth x Wagger
To 4 ½ tons English Hay 13.00$ pr ton
To rent of shop to date
To note paid Chandler at Bnk.
To insurance tax paid by me
To oxen and waggon half day some time since to draw wood
To 118 ft. 2 in. Pine Plank for Kellys Stable 15$
